page.title: 03Rowen Nursery (Jan to May)
page.content: grit and 20% loam.They told us about a year in their life and this is it. In{January,}one of the slowest months,they order seeds and draw up a seed plan.They grow about 30 different kinds of plants.They begin to plant and clear up after Christmas. In{February}more seeds are sown and extra people are needed to prick out the little plants.Primroses are ready to be sold in pots. {March}brings Mother's Day and a very busy time combined with more sowing and pricking out. {April}sees a pot plant rush with Easter coming and the tougher bedding plants are ready to go. {May}is probably the busiest month with selling at a fast rate,the lorry and van they own going off to{Reading} and{Oxford.}
